entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 1.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
